briefdescription.para: The MetaCategory of the current element.
The Trackable which hold the Augmentations and Sources.
Gets or sets the copy.
The PreviewPanel which we need to add Previewables.

The scale of the previewPanel. we need this to scale the distance and the size of the elements.

Constructor.
(This method is obsolete) adds a preview able.

parameterdescription.para: Thrown when the requested operation is unimplemented.

briefdescription.para: add Trackable is the method for adding the trackable, each PreviewPanel can holding one Trackable.

parameterdescription.para: The Vector3D to set the Trackable.

briefdescription.para: add Source or augmentation, this method can only be used with the element, which is the over element by augmentation the overelement is Trackable. by Source the overelement is augmentation.
Removes the choosen Source out of the Augmentation and also out of the sourcesList in Project.
Removes the Previewable and the Objekt, what is linked to the Previewable.
updates the preview panel.
load the project with the identical index to the previewPanel (the index is the index of the trackable list in project)
Reloads a single previewable.
Searchs in the Panel for the important PictureBox and gives this box back.
sets the currentElement in EditorWindow an marks the PictureBox in the PreviewPanel.
scales the Pictureboxes to their own scale size the size is in dependency to the scale, the sideScale of the images and and the scale of the augmentation.
scales the bitmap to the width & height which you want
Rescales the preview panel if the size was changed.
Set all needed Coordinates for the augmentation.
This updates the position of the currentElement-Picturebox.
Updates the element combobox.
Rotates the augmentation, after you've changed the Rotation.Z Vector.
Refreshs the Augmentation with the new Scale.
EventHandler for copy function. copies the currentElement

parameterdescription.para: The EventArgs instance containing the event data.

briefdescription.para: EventHandler for paste function. paste the object at the current cursor position.

briefdescription.para: EventHandler for paste function. paste the object in the center of panel

parameterdescription.para: The EventArgs instance containing the event data.

briefdescription.para: Raises the drag event when a source enters a augmentation.

briefdescription.para: Removes all Elements from the PreviewPanel and clears all references and delete the trackable from the list.
Add all existent Objects of the trackable in the Panel, this funktion is exists for change the trackable.
Adds a PictureBox with for the currentElement to the aktuell Scene.
set the PictureBox of the Augmentation to a augmentationPreview with source icon this is only able when the Augmentation is a Chart (all other Augmentations accepts no Source)
Recalculates the vector in dependency to panel.

simplesect.para: the new Vector in dependency to the panel

briefdescription.para: Select element (Event).
